title: Finger Ring
description:
Gold finger ring in the form of two serpents, the heads of which form the bezel, each head pointing in an opposite direction.  Small gold ball on the neck of one serpent.
Condition: Ring bent. object may have been an earring not a ring. Gold seems to be solid.
credit_line: Gift of Evangeline Wilbour Blashfield, Theodora Wilbour, and Victor Wilbour honoring the wishes of their mother, Charlotte Beebe Wilbour, as a memorial to their father, Charles Edwin Wilbour

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
